00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include "lsf/container/detail/basic_container.hpp"
00010 #include "lsf/container/detail/impl_bidirectional_list.hpp"
00011 #include "lsf/container/shared_mem.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/basic/empty_type.hpp"
00013 
00014 namespace lsf {
00015 namespace container {
00016 
00018 // List
00020 template <typename ElemType = lsf::basic::EmptyType, typename StoreType = SharedMem, typename SizeType = size_t>
00021 class List : public detail::BasicContainer<ElemType, SizeType, StoreType, detail::ListState<ElemType, SizeType>,
00022                                            detail::ListIterator<ElemType, SizeType>> {
00023 public:
00024     using base_type = detail::BasicContainer<ElemType, SizeType, StoreType, detail::ListState<ElemType, SizeType>,
00025                                    detail::ListIterator<ElemType, SizeType>>;
00026     using value_type = typename base_type::value_type;
00027     using size_type = typename base_type::size_type;
00028     using iterator = typename base_type::iterator;
00029     using reverse_iterator = typename base_type::reverse_iterator;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     // common list funcs
00033     bool PushBack(value_type const& val) {
00034         if (base_type::full()) return false;
00035 
00036         size_type pos = base_type::_ptr_state->GetNewNodeAndInsert(_GetPrevPos(_GetHeadPos()));
00037         new (_GetDataPtr(pos)) value_type(val);
00038         return true;
00039     }
00040 
00041     bool PushFront(value_type const& val) {
00042         if (base_type::full()) return false;
00043 
00044         size_type pos = base_type::_ptr_state->GetNewNodeAndInsert(_GetHeadPos());
00045         new (_GetDataPtr(pos)) value_type(val);
00046         return true;
00047     }
00048 
00049     bool PopFront() {
00050         if (base_type::empty()) return false;
00051 
00052         base_type::_ptr_state->FreeNode(_GetHeadPos());
00053         return true;
00054     }
00055 
00056     bool PopBack() {
00057         if (base_type::empty()) return false;
00058 
00059         base_type::_ptr_state->FreeNode(_GetPrevPos(_GetHeadPos()));
00060         return true;
00061     }
00062 
00063     bool Insert(iterator iter, value_type const& val) {
00064         if (base_type::full()) return false;
00065 
00066         size_type pos = base_type::_ptr_state->GetNewNodeAndInsert(iter.GetPos());
00067         new (_GetDataPtr(pos)) value_type(val);
00068         return true;
00069     }
00070 
00071     bool Erase(iterator iter) {
00072         if (base_type::empty()) return false;
00073 
00074         // call destructor
00075         iter->~value_type();
00076 
00077         // move to empty list
00078         base_type::_ptr_state->FreeNode(iter.GetPos());
00079         return true;
00080     }
00081 
00082     bool Erase(iterator iter_st, iterator iter_ed) {
00083         for (iterator iter = iter_st; iter != iter_ed;) {
00084             if (!Erase(iter++)) return false;
00085         }
00086         return true;
00087     }
00088 
00089     iterator Find(value_type const& val) {
00090         for (size_type pos = _GetHeadPos(); pos != _GetPrevPos(_GetHeadPos()); pos = _GetNextPos(pos)) {
00091             if (*_GetDataPtr(pos) == val) return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, pos);
00092         }
00093         return end();
00094     }
00095 
00096     // accessor
00097     iterator GetFront() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, _GetHeadPos()); }
00098     iterator GetBack() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, _GetPrevPos(_GetPrevPos(_GetHeadPos()))); }
00099 
00100     iterator begin() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, _GetHeadPos()); }
00101     iterator end() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, _GetPrevPos(_GetHeadPos())); }
00102 
00103     reverse_iterator rbegin() { return reverse_iterator(end()); }
00104     reverse_iterator rend() { return reverse_iterator(begin()); }
00105 
00106 private:
00107     value_type* _GetDataPtr(size_type pos) { return base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(pos); }
00108     size_type& _GetNextPos(size_type pos) { return base_type::_ptr_state->GetNextPos(pos); }
00109     size_type& _GetPrevPos(size_type pos) { return base_type::_ptr_state->GetPrevPos(pos); }
00110     size_type& _GetHeadPos() { return base_type::_ptr_state->GetHeadPos(); }
00111     size_type& _GetSize() { return base_type::_ptr_state->GetSize(); }
00112 };
00113 
00114 }  // end of namespace container
00115 }  // end of namespace lsf
00116
